# node-stage

A beautiful stage console.

## Install

```
npm install node-stage
```


## API 

#### success

```javascript
stage.success('this is a success message!')
```

#### info 

```javascript
stage.info('this is a info message!')
```

#### error 

```javascript
stage.error('this is a error message!')
```

#### process 

```javascript
stage.process('this is a process message!')
```

## Preview
